name: deduplicate-by-content
description: Remove duplicate objects from array based on content similarity (hash-based, field order independent)

input.description: Object containing an array field to deduplicate based on content

array.description: Name of the array field in the input object (defaults to 'items')

output.description: Object with the same structure, but with deduplicated array (objects with identical content are treated as duplicates)

examples.description: Remove objects with same content but different field order
